artist: Artist: Mission Mini-Comix, San Francisco; Publisher: Mission Mini-Comix, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Cut and folded leaf, xerographic text and illustration of a police officer pepper spraying a protester, printed on wove paper; 8 pp.
title: Mission Mini-Comix: Why Use Reason When You Can Use Pepper Spray!
